entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58141
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #58139
    Future
  • STJ Source Generator generates invalid code with value tuples #58137
    6.0.0
  • STJ Source Generator fails to do polymorphic serialization for built-in types #58134
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add Except for single item to Linq #58132
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http undoc APIs #58131
  • Microsoft.Extensions undoc APIs (more) #58128
    7.0.0
  • Tracking issue for Core Runtime HouseKeeping Items #58120
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json code generator: custom converter ignored? #58119
    6.0.0
  • Exception in HttpClient: Error while copying content to a stream, Unable to read data from the transport connection: Broken pipe #58117
    Future
  • [ios][mono][JIT] Are there any plan to allow dotnet full support / JIT / non-AOT on ios? #58115
  • iOS: LLVM fails for ios-arm #58112
    6.0.0
  • [MacOS] EXC_CRASH (SIGABRT) when GC occurs from within a callback made out of an Dispatch queue: com.apple.root.default-qos thread #58111
    6.0.0
  • Tests which depend on the host don't use a live built version #58109
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationExtensions.Exists() returns false in cases where true would be expected #58104
    7.0.0
  • [System.Linq] Performance: .ToList() counter-intuitively slower than .ToArray() #58100
  • Failed Assembly.Load and Assembly.LoadFile leaks memory #58093
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\interlocked\\compareexchange\\CompareExchangeTString\\CompareExchangeTString.cmd #58090
  • HTTP/3: SocketsHttpHandler.PlaintextStreamFilter #58089
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [ Hot Reload / EnC ] A newly added Type will not be returned from Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType (they return null) #57972
  • Failed to execute OSPlatform.get_Linux() on macOS 12 using dotnet 3.1 #56725
    Future
  • Generate workload msis in parallel #57523
  • [Android] Missing `TimeZoneInfo` information #58130
    6.0.0
  • [android] $(EnableLLVM) started failing in .NET 6 rc1 #57800
    6.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not handle reference types with design time custom converter properly #56864
    6.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Stream.PathForChildDictionaryFails #39055
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • Enable Single File testing on all libraries test projects #58135
    area-Single-File
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Avoid a JIT assert. #58127
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Conditionally build allconfigurations in source-build #58122
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use string.Empty for empty string custom arg values #58113
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Stress] Enable POST by disabling InternalServerError suppression #58110
    area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP: Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Share compiler configurations across libs & coreclr #58096
    community-contribution
  • Remove two async state machines for typical HTTP/1.1 request path #58092
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 6.0.0
  • add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58088
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

Merged

  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical` #57409
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix enum memory code paths #58076
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Fix BOX import to not create "wrong" casts #57094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Print docker info in installers tests #58061
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, auto-merge
  • [mono] Avoid a JIT assert. #58071
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • MonoAOTCompiler: Check for proxy file's target only when the cache is… #57865
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove last vestiges of nidump now that NGEN is dead #58052
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix nullability bug in System.Diagnostics.TraceSource Switch #58102
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow configuration binder to bind single elements to array #58060
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Move runtime-coreclr macOS x64 test jobs to 10.14 Helix queue #58065
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Replacement tokens in logging test baseline files #58220
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add internal junction support to link APIs #57996
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #57445
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58152
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use temporary ni.dll.tmp files with crossgen2 pipeline mode in order to not interfere with crossgen2 itself #57341
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code in AppDomain #58219
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Refactor subrange assertion generation and propagation #55186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Tls resume PoC (server stateless) #57079
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS #57101
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix frequent FuncEval abort upon hitting a breakpoint in an ASP.NET Core web app #58217
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix frequent FuncEval abort upon hitting a breakpoint in an ASP.NET Core web app #58218
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Handle shadowed property names in DiagnosticsSourceEventSource #58212
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.0
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions after updating APICompat that uses references #58208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58215
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58020
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58014
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix trim_youngest_desired #58180
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58209
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-build-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58192
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [WASM] Enabled strict mode on all JS files #54011
    arch-wasm
  • Make JsonGenerator be an incremental generator #57088
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58194
    area-codeflow
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Implement Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables for Apple platforms using official API #58161
    area-PAL-libraries, community-contribution
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Support public key token in DefineDynamicAssembly #58016
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58064
  • [libraries] Skip System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs PNSE, System.Diagnostics.Tracing and System.Runtime.Extensions test #58210
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58206
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Fix memory leak in enqueue/dequeue of EventPipe callback data. #58170
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Enable win registry install location for all architectures #57851
    Servicing-consider, area-Host
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [MacCatalyst] Make AppleCryptoNative_SslSetEnabledCipherSuites check for 32 bit & 16 bit SSLCipherSuite #58182
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #58056
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, os-tvos
  • [mono] Fix regression introduced by PR 55726 #58201
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58195
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.0
  • Re-enable Vector3DistanceTest #57077
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add test that GetCustomAttribute returns string.Empty #58197
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add Crossgen2 symbol files to package #58193
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    community-contribution
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix VN incorrect optimizations with a new JitEEInterface function. #58005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Socket: check connect result when non-blocking connect completes. #57756
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • A few more regex test #58154
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Prevent AV in processinfo2 while suspended on Mono. #58158
    area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.0
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more stress-testing for Inliner #57691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720
    increase-code-coverage
  • Fix ep_rt_atomic_compare_exchange_size_t in Mono EventPipe shim. #58164
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Check Options validations length instead of null #58157
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use IndexOf to find value for smaller enums #57973
  • Clean-up duplicated PathInternal files #57988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix a few places where we did not use Register type for struct locals. #58082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Migrate LoggerMessageGenerator to IIncrementalGenerator #58068
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58036
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Delete `TruncateOrSignExtend32` #56904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation to Microsoft.Extensions.Http #57719
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Adding x64 on ARM64 support to installers #58059
    * NO MERGE *, area-Setup
  • Rename NGenHashTable to DacEnumerableHashTable to describe its unique feature and remove dead code #58080
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [iOS] AOT run w/ smaller test files #57332
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable the mono subset to build on FreeBSD x64 #57027
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception during compilation #1457

PullRequests

Updated

  • Disable COM specific marshalers on Unix #1464
  • Update LLVM 5.0 -> 12.0 #1461
    area-NativeAOT
  • Collection tests for dfa #1462
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge main #1447

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • msbuild / dotnet build does not pass the property generated by nuget packagereference's GeneratePathProperty #20160
  • Include additional data in results of ShowMissingWorkloads task for Visual Studio in-product acquisition #20151
    6.0.1xx
  • When workload MSI package fails to download, output is not ideal #20143
    6.0.1xx
  • Workload installer needs to be aware of x64-retargeted packs #20139
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet format produces false positives on CS0234 and CS0103 #20126
  • .NET 6 preview 6.0.100-rc.1.21416.1 DevCerts Requiring Escalated Privileges With Every New WebApp #20124
  • SDK 3.1 builds C#9 code in a way leading to bugs #20119
  • 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '5.0.0' was not found #20116
  • When will .net 6 and .net 5 support the comment in the method to display Chinese? #20112
  • Run multiple test assemblies in parallel with dotnet test and NUnit #20115
  • NETSDK1145: 'The Apphost pack is not installed' error while building C++\CLI project (targeting .NET 5) with Visual Studio 2019 16.11.1 if Visual Studio 2022 17.0.0 Preview 3.1 is installed #20109
  • Workload repair ignores planned action #20108
    6.0.2xx

Closed

  • With RC1 initial build installed, maui workload install failed in CLI: One or more errors occurred. (microsoft.maui.core.ref.android.msi.x64::6.0.100-rc.1.1351 is not found #20111
  • Project templates from workloads are not shown in `dotnet new` template list (MSI based install) #20146

PullRequests

Created

  • Project Reference support for WinRT Components #20153
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
  • Serve aspnet-browser-refresh.js from a rooted path #20150
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not fail design time builds when there are missing workload packs #20147
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Arch-independent support for `dotnet run` #20102
    Area-External, Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • Dispose open handle on the package #20136
  • Clear hot reload specific environment variables as part of the startu… #20131
    Area-Infrastructure
  • "Cherry pick main changes"" #19980
  • Clear hot reload specific environment variables as part of the startup hook #20093
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only show VS workload list header on windows #20063
    Area-Workloads
  • Add toolset zip as source build intermediate #20009
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update global.json #20212
  • Prkrishn/add tests #20209
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20199
    Area-Workloads
  • Add VisualStudioComponentIds metadata for suggested workloads #20200
    Area-Workloads
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Update Versions.props for 7.0 branding #19800
    Branding
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Avoid signing and generating unnecessary packages #20081
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Avoid signing and generating unnecessary packages #20080
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Restore preferred packages functionality #19878
    Area-NuGet
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open issue: parentheses and additive expressions #5106
  • Interpolated String Handlers: Implicit conversions to strings #5077

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Improved interpolated strings #4487
    10.0
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Explicit lambda return type #4934
    10.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #55896
    17.0
  • Consider if "Add Using" quickfix should suggest adding "global" using as well #55895
  • Find all references for a "global" using alias finds alias references only in the file that defines it #55894
  • When Quick Info content too long, can't scroll to read information at bottom. #55888
  • Extract local function includes nameof parameter #55887
  • Add "fix namespaces" action that applies to all files in a Solution Explorer folder #55886
  • ExpressionCompiler is unable to emit a correct code in case of captured pattern matched variable #55883
    17.0
  • RZ10012 warning cannot be upgraded to error in .editorconfig #55921
  • `Default` should be allowed on `Private Protected` properties #55880

Closed

  • EnC: Report rude edit when compiler adds synthesized types to the compilation and runtime does not support adding types #54676
    17.0
  • Large memory usage when serializing results of `GetUnusedReferenceAsync` #55869
  • Enabled nullable by default in .NET 6 #52302
    17.0
  • Why the Visual Studio's watch window show the property , and the "@" in front of "type". #55859
  • suggestion IDE0038 + LINQ leads to error CS0103 #51340
    17.0
  • Roslyn Compiler Service is forcing unneeded GCs, wasting CPU time #55807
  • Fix Hot Reload active statement remapping #52100
    17.0.P4
  • IDE0078 - Use pattern matching removes necessary side-effects in some cases #50462
    Backlog
  • Add "IndentNamespace" formatting option. #24129
    Backlog
  • Invert If refactoring is missing unit tests for Visual Basic #55677
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Experimentation options #55902
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more attribute tests for more things #55881
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move the bulk of the work for rename after apply to be off the UI thread #55878
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC

Merged

  • Reduce array allocations when constructing options #55884
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check CS0103 when try to replace type cast by 'is' pattern #55864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EnC - Report diagnostic when compiler synthesizes new types on unsupported runtime #55876
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Bulk update project when several documents change #55813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove synchronous blocking call of go-to-def. #55885
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55839
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Clear dependency information from unused references after analysis #55875
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #55628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove attribute-dependent typeof warning #55854
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • 🐇 Convert FileChangeWatcher to batch processing #55855
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Relax the induced GC strategy in ServerDispatcher #55814
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Restore intent of some top-level statement tests #55865
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Ignore stale active statements. #55850
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fixes #50462 #55427
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55874
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Hold onto the TextBufferContainer for a ITextBuffer weakly #53245
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Reduce CSharpFormattingOptions2 .cctor IL size/JIT compile time #55935
    Area-IDE
  • Add an option to let user could change the position of Inheritance Margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Use Auto Prop analyzer bails out for all attributes #55872
    Area-IDE
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870
    Area-IDE
  • Implement SpillSequenceSpiller.VisitMakeRefOperator. #55928
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure synthesized attribute definitions are emitted for lambda and local function signatures #55873
    Area-Compilers
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Move more code to async gotodef helpers #55929
    Area-IDE
  • Allow fully oblivious types to coexist with nullable-aware base types in partial classes #55861
    Area-Compilers
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Freeze semantics for all branches when asked #55910
    Area-IDE
  • Add File.Exists check when renaming a file as part of InlineRename #55908
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid calling DefineUserDefinedStateMachineHoistedLocal for fields without long-lived local slot. #55922
    Area-Compilers
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new high memory events for releasing Roslyn caches #54850
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable VSTHRD200 (Use 'Async' suffix for async methods) #51812
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Add generator driver cache to VBCSCompiler #55023
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Segmented dictionary updates #54569
    Area-IDE
  • Temporarily use procdump to capture testhost dumps on helix #55657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Fix compile errors in test method code. #55613
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RemovePage by Name #2263
  • [Bug] Border Width seem to calculate differently on iOS vs Android #2262
  • [Bug] Android looks like it has a rounding different when apply Corner Radius vs iOS #2261
  • [Bug] Package not found #2260
  • [Bug] Starting app with RTL language doesn't currently work #2258
  • [Question] Platform specific codeand packages #2257
  • [Spec] Should BorderWidth be converted to Thickness? #2256
  • [Bug] Not all controls are currently working with RTL #2255
  • [Bug] Setting Border Width to zero causes the control to disappear on Android #2254
  • [Bug] Remap the existing IBorderElement properties so they propagate to the new Border Property #2253
  • WPF/WinForms Blazor Desktop need to override WebViewManager to use static web assets #2252
  • [Bug] Theme not applied to Switch control (Android) #2249
  • [Bug] Maui-Blazor Project Template crashes in Release Mode #2246
  • Add MauiAppBuilder top-level properties for common features: Handlers, Fonts, etc. #2245
  • Add support for hosted services in .NET MAUI apps #2244
  • Use top-level statements + source gen for .NET MAUI app startup/config code #2243
  • Consider changing the names of the native app base types (MauiWinUIApplication, MauiApplication, MauiUIApplicationDelegate) #2242

Closed

  • Make AbsoluteLayout a new layout #1961
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] TableView and its underlying elements need to implement IVisualTreeElement overrides #2124

PullRequests

Created

  • Start to remove old things in Maui #2266
  • Support Min/Max Height/Width on IView #2265
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • BoxView Handlers #2250

Merged

  • remove TypeConversionAttribute #2210
  • Android/iOS Button ImageSource #2079
    t/breaking 💥, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • Build the templates #2264
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ScreenReader.Announce implementation for WINUI #2251
  • Insert iOS subviews correctly #2259
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Implement FlowDirection property in ViewHandlers #948
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Bump to Reloadify3000 1.0.7 #2218
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [build] fix local 'dotnet cake' builds #2234
  • ContentView XAML Item Template #2064
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Add exception handling for GatherXmlnsDefinitionAttributes Assembly Loading #2229
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentView CSharp Item Template #2065
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • ContentPage CSharp Item Template #2063
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • AbsoluteLayout #2136
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Can't include windows on mac #2241
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2240
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement IVisualTreeElement for TableView #2237
  • Make Application.Properties obsolete and fix implementation #2158
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • PartialAppManifest is now a real feature #2238
  • Update SkiaSharp and add pdb files #2195
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Update to WindowsAppSdk 1.0.0-experimental #2047
    6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • Set fewer defaults in MauiAppBuilder #2275
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Factory spike #2239
  • Include Border everywhere #650

  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LazyLoaded Properties are not Obfuscator-safe #25720
  • Report connection security: using SSL or not. #25719
  • [Always Encrypted] EF Core 5.0 Operand type clash : nvarchar(4000) is incopataible with decimal(19,3) #25713
  • Don't use MERGE for single row insert #25712
    6.0.0
  • Order By Date Descending Doesn't Return Correctly #25706
  • Migrations: Problem with 3 nested levels of owned type properties #25704
  • Using EF & SQLite crashes in aspnet:5.0-alpine docker image with Segmentation Fault #25703
  • Cosmos: translate indexing into collection #25701
  • Cosmos: translate Length/Count on collections #25700
  • Avoid pushdown when applying OrderBy over Distinct #25698
  • Can't create tables in sqlite file #25694

Closed

  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Index was out of range when using AsSplitQuery() #25680
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query/Test: convert remaining complex nav collection tests to AssertQuery #24708
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Nested self referencing objects not correctly assigned to objects #24368
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query with nested select statement no longer work in EF Core 3.0 when using owned types #18582
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Foreign key facets are not propagated from the principal properties #15339
    6.0.0-rc2
  • SelectMany with nested navigation throws #12329
    6.0.0-rc2
  • EF Core Migration Bundles: dotnet ef 6.0.0-preview.7.21378.4: No --output option #25699
  • InMemory database provider fails to execute Automapper-generated LINQ query with Select() mapping to List<int> #24047
  • [Cosmos] ISO date time strings are not read back correctly from the database #25656
  • Perf regression in NavigationsQuerySqliteTests.PredicateAcrossOptionalNavigation[Async=false&Filter=false] #23915

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve insert perf for store-generated values #25718
  • Detatching principal keeps track of unreferenced dependents #25702

Merged

  • Query: Add regression test for #24368 #25715
  • Query: Add regression test for #25680 #25709
  • Fix to #24708 - Query/Test: convert remaining complex nav collection tests to AssertQuery #25690
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25686
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [SMALL] Fully printing include tree structure #25693
  • Add MigrationsModelDiffer tests for propagating facets #25691
  • Query: Add regression test for #12329 #25687
  • Query: Add regression test for #18582 #25685

Updated

  • Configure ambiguous navigations with RequiredAttribute #25737
  • Metadata: Avoid sharing default mappings for entity types #25734
  • Fix to #23990 - Relational: IS (NOT) NULL requires parenthesis when not in left side of an equality #25722
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25723
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Adding some regression tests for issues fixed earlier #25736
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.5 #25730
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
